data.homeworkTitle: 第十一章 颅脑疾病病人的护理

questions.title: 病人，男，18岁。头部外伤15小时急诊入院。查体:呼唤能睁眼，回答问题不切题，疼痛存在，双侧瞳孔等大、等圆，直径3mm,对光反射灵敏，低温低热。病人躁动不安，下列护理措施中不恰当的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"立即给予镇静药","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"加用床栏保护","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"不强加约束，以免过分挣扎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"勤剪指甲，以防抓伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"必要时派人守护","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，42岁。车祸后头痛、呕吐，但意识清醒，CT检查发现颅内血肿。病人如出现黑便应停用
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"甘露醇","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"甲氰咪胍","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"云南白药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"奥美拉唑","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"地塞米松","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 病人，男，20岁。头额部摔伤后立即昏迷，送医院后逐渐清醒，3小时后再度昏迷，查体:R12次/分，P60次/分应考虑为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"脑震荡","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"轻度脑挫裂伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"重度脑摔裂伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"急性硬膜下血肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"硬膜外血肿","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 关于脑疝的处理错误的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"保持呼吸通畅并吸氧","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"密切配察病情变化","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"20%甘露醇快速静脉输注","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"原因未明前头痛时注射哌替啶","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"做好紧急手术治疗的护理","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 急性硬脑膜外血肿病人典型意识障碍的表现是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"短暂昏迷","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"持续昏迷","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"昏迷-清醒-昏迷","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"昏迷进行性加重","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"昏迷程度有波动","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，28岁。头部受伤后意识模糊为20分钟，头痛，恶心，呕吐，追问受伤经过不能记忆，查体无异常倾向。应诊断为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"脑震荡","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"脑挫裂伤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"颅骨骨折","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"硬脑膜外血肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"颅内脓肿","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，21岁。头部外伤后昏迷10分钟，清醒2小时后再次昏迷，查体:血压增高、脉搏减慢，左侧瞳孔散大，右侧肢体瘫痪，其治疗原则是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"神经营养药物应用","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"抗生素应用","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"非手术治疗无效再手术","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"立即手术","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"输液","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，女，45岁，因脑肿瘤、 颅内压增高，行脑室引流术后3小时，引流管无脑脊液流出，处理方法错误的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"将引流袋略降低","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"报告医师","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"将引流管轻轻旋转","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"生理盐水冲洗","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"必要时换管","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 两人，男，20岁。突然摔倒、意识丧失。查体:P70次1分， BP 18 69.8kPa(140/75mmnHg)呼吸深慢，节律规整，深昏迷状态，双侧瞳孔等大、等圆，对光反应迟钝，双侧视神经盘水肿，首要的治疗措施是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"手术治疗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"应用止血药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"应用脱水剂","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"应用降压药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"应用呼吸兴奋剂","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，36岁。脑挫裂伤。入院时血压20/10.7kPa(150/80mmHg).脉搏60次/分。呼吸12次/分。为避免诱发脑疝，应忌做
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"腰穿","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"冬眠","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"脱水","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"抗感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"补液","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，43岁。头部被砸伤2小时，伤后立即出现意识障碍30分钟。来院后自述头痛，呕吐1次。入院后头痛逐渐加重，视物模糊，昏迷再次出现。若病人出现躁动现象，测量生命体征的顺序为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"呼吸-脉搏-血压","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"血压-脉搏-呼吸","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"呼吸-血压-脉搏","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"脉搏-呼吸-血压","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"血压-呼吸-脉搏","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人。男，34岁。颅内占位疾病住院，行肿瘤切除术，术后第2天出现颅内压增高，护士发现病人右侧瞳孔缩小，考虑脑疝发生，此时首要的措施是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"急诊手术","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"低温冬眼","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"静脉输入高渗脱水利","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"静脉输入抗生素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"高压大量灌肠","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，35岁。坠楼致脑挫裂伤，P60次/分，BP 150/80mmHg,R 12次/分。应取体位是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"头高卧位，床头抬高45° ~60°","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"头高卧位，床头抬高15° ~30°","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"平卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"侧卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"头低足高位","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，42岁。车祸后头痛、呕吐，但意识清醒，CT检查发现颅内血肿。护理体检时可出现的表现是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"血压升高、脉细速、呼吸浅而快","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"血压升高、脉细速、呼吸深而快","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"血压升高、脉缓而有力、呼吸深而慢","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"血压下降、脉细速、呼吸浅而急促","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"血压下降、脉搏有力、呼吸浅速","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，18岁。奔跑时突然摔倒、意识丧失。查体:P65次/分，BP 18.6/9 8kPa(140/75mmHg),呼吸深慢，节律规整，深昏迷状态，双侧瞳孔等大等圆，对光反应退钝，双侧视神经盘水肿。护理措施正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"平卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"每日输入的等渗盐水不超过1000ml","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"每日输液量在1500ml以内","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"快速输液","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"保持每日尿量不少于600ml","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 颅内压增高“三主征”是指
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"头晕、猝倒、视神经盘水肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"头痛、呕吐。意识障得","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"头晕，头痛、生命体征变化","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"头痛、呕吐、视神经盘水肿","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"头晕，嗜睡、呕吐","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，43岁。头部外伤后昏迷2小 时，曾呕吐数次。查体: BP 180/90mmHgP50次/分,R8次1分。脑脊液检查有红细胞，颅内压力增高。考虑为脑挫裂伤合并蛛网膜下腔出血。行脑室引流护理中判断引流管是否通畅的简单法是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"病人病情是否缓解","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"是否有引流液","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"引流液的量的多少","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"管内的液面随病人呼吸、脉搏上下 波动","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"导管是否扭曲、受压","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，28岁。脑外伤后出现小脑幕切迹疝，临床表规描述正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"血压升高，心率加快","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"意识障碍，呼吸急促","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"患侧瞳孔缩小，对侧肢体肌张力下降，腱反射消失","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"患侧瞳孔扩大，患侧股体肌张力升高，健反射亢进","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"意识障碍，患侧瞳孔短暂缩小，以后散大，对侧肢体瘫痪","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 病人，男，35岁。脑外伤致小脑幕切迹疝，行冬眠低温治疗。护理中最重要的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"防止出现寒战","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"防止肺部感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"降温不宜太快","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"按时检查生命体征和神志","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"协助翻身","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 病人，男，36岁。因颅内压增高，头痛逐渐加重，行腰椎穿刺脑脊液检查时突发急性枕骨大孔疝。其最主要表现为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"意识障碍","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"呼吸和循环障碍","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"瞳孔散大","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"肢体瘫瘓","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"瞳孔缩小","IsAnswer":false}]
